changelog:
Syberia OS updated!

Current build date: 10/27/2018
Minimum firmware required: 8.9.20 or 8.4.19 (depends from your battery type)
Minimum TWRP required: 3.2.3(latest wight554) or OrangeFox R8.2

Changelog:
Android-9.0.0_r12 (PD1A.180720.031)
Syberia: Bump to version 1.3
Introduce QS tile style picker
Fixed search in settings 
Launcher: iconpack support
Fixed incall sound issue
Battery: Forced show percent in PowerSave
Themes: various fixes
Hide signal icons for disabled SIMs
Added VOLTE icon
Add OneHanded mode to button mappings
Fix Gboard vibration
Update translations
A lot of Google and CAF fixes in 9.0.0_r12

device specific:
updated xiaomi men├╣ (sweep 2 sleep isn't working at the moment)
